About Us

ABOUT US

About us

Our business solutions are built upon three decades of experience in senior positions at some of the UK’s most influential security organisations.

HiveLOGIC’s core purpose is to help clients address, manage and reduce risks. Protecting reputations, brands and shareholders.

We mitigate risk through a systemic approach that embraces digital transformation to drive business improvement, while ensuring shareholders and key business decision makers are protected.

Our business proposition will reduce cost through a single solution that works across the entire business. Optimizing operations across:

Cyber Security    Physical Security    Facilities Management

Operational Systems   ICT Network Operations

The HiveLOGIC  Eco-system

Our Eco-system allows us to focus on meeting a wide range of customer needs through digital techniques designed to address and manage risk.It underpins our company culture. Working in consort with carefully selected partners is a proven business model that optimises client value combined with global thought-leadership.

Our Eco-system is a dynamic network that brings specialisations and scalability to play. It’s cost effective and entirely effective.

 We leverage the most suitable partners and expertise to match client requirements.

 By working collaboratively, we minimise the total cost of business development, marketing and sales.

 Each partner is an expert in their area of specialisation.

 Collaborative solutions are developed without the risk of getting qualifed-out and left to the larger System Integrators.

 

The HiveLOGIC  Difference

HiveLOGIC is different and works with clients to:

   Understand all of the risks associated with their business (physical and digital)
 
   To constantly monitor their entire business environment: Business Risks and KPIs
 
   Provide an immediate and appropriate response to any risk or threat to your business.
